R0046.title: Minor Age Verification Bypass
R0046.definition: Bypassing minor identification mechanisms through identity forgery.
R0046.description: Bypassing minor identification mechanisms by using real or forged adult identities, including using adult ID cards, facial recognition, fingerprints, and other biometric data.

references.title: Post-00s and Post-10s vs. Anti-Addiction Systems: A Battle of Wits Worthy of a Spy Thriller
